rows: Href for a button link, will switch the element tag to an <a> if an href is provided
Full SVG string of an icon to be injected into component.
The text on the button. Overridden by the default prop.
The type attribute of the underlying HTML button.
Text description rendered below the title
Relative path to the image displayed on the card
Metadata text displayed on the card
Title text displayed on the card
Accepts links or buttons as actions at the bottom of the card
Accepts miscellaneous content for the card
Array containing data table header strings or objects
An array of arrays representing the data for each row and cell
Sets height and width of the icon

Adds a visibly hidden `<title>` element with a corresponding `aria-labelledby` tag
when provided. Used only when icons stand alone without other context.

Determines which icon will be shown. When leveraging the Icon sprite, the id of the
sprite symbol should be provided (ex: `#angle-right`). When using ES6 modules, pass the
name of the module (ex: `EsdsIconAngleRight`). See usage examples below.
If true, hides child esds-list-item elements
If true, enables a visibility toggle for child esds-list-item elements
Header text displayed above the child esds-list-item elements
If provided the header will include a link to the given href
If true, shows selected state on child list items
The size of the list item
The visual layout of the tabs
